title: Project ATIO Overview
content: ATIO (Advanced Technical Information Organizer) is a system designed to help users organize, retrieve, and understand complex technical information. It uses AI to process documents and answer questions based on the knowledge base.

title: Vegetable Production Guidelines
content: For optimal vegetable production, ensure soil pH is between 6.0 and 7.0. Regular watering and proper fertilization are essential. Rotate crops annually to prevent soil depletion and disease buildup.

title: Sustainable Farming Practices
content: Sustainable farming involves using methods that are environmentally friendly, such as cover cropping, reduced tillage, and integrated pest management (IPM). These practices help maintain soil health and biodiversity.
